text_block_list.text: Some time has passed since I've started overseeing Cheval's training.

text_block_list.name: Instructor A
text_block_list.text: Remember everything we went over in class and put all your effort into your running. Now then, we'll start with Team A. Please enter your gates.
Apparently Cheval Grand will also be taking part in this race. I headed to the bleachers to observe for future reference.

(…Even though it's just a lesson, I'm still feeling nervous. 
…What if I end up losing by a small margin again?)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Huh? Trainer?
(…That's right. That's right. I'm no longer worthless. I'm so much more now thanks to them.)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (…Grrrr, don't let it all be in vain! Time to get my head in the game!…I'll give it my all!)
The race began shortly after.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (My starting dash was good! I just need to follow behind Kitasan while holding my position!)
(The final straight is coming up, time to cut through in the last spurt!)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand

text_block_list.text: The group has entered the final straight. Kitasan leads the pack in front. Cheval Grand is close behind her.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Taaaaaah!!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Ah! I'll go too!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah, haah!!
(I… I hate myself. I'm weak, gloomy, and above all, can't get any results. I never, ever, believed in myself… but now!)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand

text_block_list.text: "There aren't many that are like you"
"There aren't many that are like you"

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (In their eyes… was me!)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (…That's why—!)

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I'm Kitasan Black! My goal is to be a powerful and sparkling horse girl, just like Tokai Teio!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (I want to believe! I want to believe in myself! My dream, I have to—!)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…Tch, chase after it! I need to chase it to the ends of this Earth! 
——Aaaaaaaaaaaaagh!!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Cheval
text_block_list.text: Hah, haah, hah!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: …Uwah～! We crossed at the same time, huh! I couldn't escape you～!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
But… ehehe! That was fun! 
You're amazing Cheval!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Huh.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
You were burning so bright and so dazzling, I was in awe! 
…Hey, what's your dream?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: My… dream?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …That's… um—

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
……Um. 
Sorry, give me some time… Just… 1 day, please.
Haaah, I finally let out a breath. Even though it was just a lesson race, it was such a heated match.
choice_data_list: (I knew it, she has immense talent.)

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I was reminded of that fact— 
Later that evening.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(…… 
You were able to give me what I was missing.)
(I wouldn't have been able to do this all on my own…)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …C'mon Cheval, you need to be brave for once!
Cheval Grand visited my office with a stiff look on her face.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…… 
Excuse me! Do you have a moment!?
choice_data_list: Of course, what do you need?
Of course, what do you need?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …That's… I—

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
I may not be… the mightiest horse girl… 
I'm plain, gloomy, quick to gain weight, and not sparkly at all—

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
But… Even if, even if that's the case… 
I have something I want to work towards!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: I… I want… I want to—!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: I want to—
I want to be… the mightiest horse girl in the world!
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand

text_block_list.text: Cheval has never been one to lock eyes with me, and yet this time, she was staring straight at me with her eyes full of hope and determination.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
I-if you're with me, I feel like I can achieve that dream. 
So that's why, please join me!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Ah, no, wait! When I say "please join me", of course only if you don't hate the idea!

The race I just watched recently was splendid. 
And even if I didn't get to watch it, I was already well aware of her talent.
choice_data_list: Of course! We'll achieve your dream!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Haah!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
T-thank you very much! 
I will work as hard as I can!

Her stiff face quickly loosened up. And with the golden rays of the sun shining through the window… 
I saw a bright smile on her face.
